# MPMediaType

**Structure**

The properties for defining the type for a media item.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MPMediaType
```

## Overview

Media item types are possible values for the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaItemPropertyMediaType] property. A media item can have more than one media item type.

## Constants

- **music**: The media item contains music.
- **podcast**: The media item contains a podcast.
- **audioBook**: The media item contains an audio book.
- **audioITunesU**: The media item contains an iTunes U audio lesson.
- **anyAudio**: The media item contains an unspecified type of audio content.
- **movie**: The media item contains a movie.
- **tvShow**: The media item contains a TV show.
- **videoPodcast**: The media item contains a video podcast.
- **musicVideo**: The media item contains a music video.
- **videoITunesU**: The media item contains an iTunes U video.
- **homeVideo**: The media item contains a home video.
- **anyVideo**: The media item contains an unspecified type of video content.
- **any**: The media item contains an unspecified type of media content.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

## Media item types and keys

- **General media item property keys**: System-defined properties for obtaining the metadata for a media item.
- **User-defined property keys**: Properties for obtaining user-defined metadata for a media item.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
